column1: in memory of elmer cleveland musselwhite| elmer cleveland musselwhite
column10: 2015 at his residence. he was born in robeson county
column12: 1946 to the late elmer c. musselwhite
column13: sr. and the late martha florence britt musselwhite. he was an insurance salesman for united insurance of america. he was preceded in death by his parents; his wife
column14: linda faye rigsbee musselwhite; and a grandson
column15: patrick yancy musselwhite. mr. musselwhite is survived by his son
column16: george clay musselwhite (brenda) of whiteville; a daughter
column17: windy musselwhite of the home; and a brother
column18: randy musselwhite of lumberton. a time of visitation will be held on monday
column20: 2015 from 6:00-8:00 pm at floyd mortuary & crematory
column22: 809 east 5th street in lumberton. a graveside service will be held on tuesday
column24: 2015 at 11:00 am at gardens of faith cemetery with rev. robert jordan officiating. in lieu of flowers contributions may be made in his honor to the gideon international
